customMethods.name: setKpi1_TotalReferrals
customMethods.script:
kpi1 = self.getChild("KPI1")

	query = """
SELECT COUNT([Referral].[id]) totalReferrals
FROM [participant].[Referral]
WHERE [ProviderId] = ?
"""
	providerId = payload.get('providerId')
	args = [providerId]
	
	# examples providerId :  9, 10, 24, 30	
	# Expect providerId as  int 
	
	kpi1.props.params.Title = 'Total Referrals'
	result = system.db.runScalarPrepQuery(query, args,'RITIOps')	
	kpi1.props.params.Value = result if result else 0

customMethods.name: setKpi2_DaysWoReferrals
customMethods.script:
# Total Referrals (Year To Date): total count of referrals since 1/1 of the current year
	
	kpi2 = self.getChild("KPI2")

	query = """
SELECT TOP (1) DATEDIFF(day, [Referral].[timeCreated], GETDATE()) daysWithoutReferrals
FROM [participant].[Referral]
WHERE [ProviderId] = ?
ORDER BY [Referral].[timeCreated] desc
"""

	providerId = payload.get('providerId')
	args = [providerId]
	# examples providerId :  9, 10, 24, 30	
	# Expect providerId as  int 

	kpi2.props.params.Title = 'Days Without Referrals'
	
	result = system.db.runScalarPrepQuery(query, args,'RITIOps')	
	kpi2.props.params.Value = result if result else 0

customMethods.name: cleanKpis
customMethods.script:
kpi1 = self.getChild("KPI1")
	kpi2 = self.getChild("KPI2")

	kpi1.props.params.Title = ''
	kpi1.props.params.Value = 0
		
	kpi2.props.params.Title = ''
	kpi2.props.params.Value = 0
